title: Practice Challenge

hints.text: Add `: string` to both interface properties, `: User` to the function parameter, and `: string` for the return type.

commonMistakes.mistake: Trying to convert everything at once
commonMistakes.consequence: Overwhelming and error-prone; too many type errors to fix at once.
commonMistakes.correction: Convert one file or module at a time, starting with core utilities.

commonMistakes.consequence: Defeats the purpose of TypeScript; you lose all type checking benefits.
commonMistakes.correction: Take time to define proper types; use 'any' only as a temporary placeholder.
